flavorText.text:
へいこうして　ならぶ　くうかんの
はざまに　すむと　いわれている。
しんわに　とうじょうする　ポケモン。

くうかんを　ゆがめる　のうりょくを
もち　シンオウちほうの　しんわでは
かみさまとして　えがかれている。

へいこうして　ならぶ　くうかんの
はざまに　すむと　いわれている。
しんわに　とうじょうする　ポケモン。

くうかんを　ゆがめる　のうりょくを
もち　シンオウちほうの　しんわでは
かみさまとして　えがかれている。

평행으로 늘어선 공간의
틈새에 산다고 전해진다.
신화에 등장하는 포켓몬이다.

공간을 뒤틀리게 하는 능력을
가졌으며 신오지방의 신화에서는
신으로 묘사되고 있다.

평행으로 늘어선 공간의
틈새에 산다고 전해진다.
신화에 등장하는 포켓몬이다.

공간을 뒤틀리게 하는 능력을
가졌으며 신오지방의 신화에서는
신으로 묘사되고 있다.

On dit que la stabilité de l’espace
est maintenue par le souffle de ce
Pokémon légendaire de Sinnoh.

On dit que la stabilité de l’espace
est maintenue par le souffle de ce
Pokémon légendaire de Sinnoh.

On dit qu’il hante une faille d’une dimension
parallèle à la nôtre. Il apparaît dans la mythologie.

Il peut modeler l’espace. Les mythes de Sinnoh en
parlent comme d’une divinité ancienne.

On dit qu’il hante une faille d’une dimension parallèle
à la nôtre. Il apparaît dans la mythologie.

Il peut modeler l’espace. Les mythes de Sinnoh en parlent
comme d’une divinité ancienne.

Man sagt, es lebe in einem Spalt in einer
Paralleldimension. Es wird in der Mythologie erwähnt.

Es hat die Macht, den Raum zu krümmen. In den
Mythen von Sinnoh erscheint es als Gottheit.

Man sagt, es lebe in einem Spalt in einer Paralleldimension.
Es wird in der Mythologie erwähnt.

Es hat die Macht, den Raum zu krümmen. In den Mythen
von Sinnoh erscheint es als Gottheit.

Se dice que vive en una dimensión espacial paralela.
Aparece en la mitología.

Tiene la habilidad de distorsionar el espacio. La
mitología de Sinnoh lo describe como una deidad.

Se dice que vive en una dimensión espacial paralela. Aparece
en la mitología.

Tiene la habilidad de distorsionar el espacio. La mitología de
Sinnoh lo describe como una deidad.

Si dice che viva in una dimensione parallela alla
nostra. Appare nella mitologia.

Ha l’abilità di distorcere lo spazio. Nella mitologia
della regione di Sinnoh è una divinità.

Si dice che viva in una dimensione parallela alla nostra.
Appare nella mitologia.

Ha l’abilità di distorcere lo spazio. Nella mitologia della
regione di Sinnoh è una divinità.

It has the ability to distort
space. It is described as a deity
in Sinnoh-region mythology.

It is said to live in a gap in the
spatial dimension parallel to ours.
It appears in mythology.

A legendary Pokémon of Sinnoh.
It is said that space becomes more
stable with PALKIA’s every breath.

Its total control over the boundaries
of space enable it to transport itself to
faraway places or even other dimensions.

Its total control over the boundaries
of space enable it to transport itself to
faraway places or even other dimensions.

A legendary Pokémon of Sinnoh.
It is said that space becomes more
stable with Palkia’s every breath.

stable with Palkia’s every breath.

stable with Palkia’s every breath.

A legendary Pokémon of Sinnoh.
It is said that space becomes more
stable with Palkia’s every breath.

It is said to live in a gap in the spatial dimension
parallel to ours. It appears in mythology.

It has the ability to distort space. It is described as
a deity in Sinnoh-region mythology.

It is said to live in a gap in the spatial dimension
parallel to ours. It appears in mythology.

It has the ability to distort space. It is described as
a deity in Sinnoh-region mythology.

This Pokémon is feared as a deity in Hisuian legend. The birth
of Palkia was what caused the walls of our world to disappear,
creating a sky that spans for infinity.
